aqiLevel.healthEffectsStatement: Keiner
aqiLevel.guidance: Keiner

aqiLevel.healthEffectsStatement: Atmungssymptome bei ungewöhnlich empfindlichen Personen möglich; Mögliche Verschlimmerung von Herz- oder Lungenerkrankungen bei Personen mit kardiopulmonaler Erkrankung und älteren Erwachsenen
aqiLevel.guidance: Ungewöhnlich sensible Menschen sollten in Betracht ziehen, längere oder schwere Belastungen zu reduzieren

aqiLevel.healthEffectsStatement: Erhöhung der Wahrscheinlichkeit von Atemwegsbeschwerden in sensiblen Gruppen, einschließlich älterer Erwachsener, Kinder und Personen mit niedrigerem sozioökonomischen Status; Verschlimmerung der Herz- oder Lungenkrankheit und vorzeitige Sterblichkeit bei Menschen mit Herz- oder Lungenkrankheit
aqiLevel.guidance: Menschen mit Herz- oder Lungenerkrankungen, ältere Erwachsene, Kinder und Menschen mit einem niedrigeren sozioökonomischen Status sollten eine längere oder schwere Anstrengung reduzieren

aqiLevel.healthEffectsStatement: Erhöhte Verschlechterung der Atemwegsbeschwerden in sensiblen Gruppen, einschließlich älterer Erwachsener, Kinder und Personen mit niedrigerem sozioökonomischen Status; erhöhte Verschlimmerung von Herz- oder Lungenerkrankungen und vorzeitige Sterblichkeit bei Menschen mit Herz- oder Lungenerkrankungen; erhöhte respiratorische Effekte in der Allgemeinbevölkerung
aqiLevel.guidance: Menschen mit Herz- oder Lungenerkrankungen, ältere Erwachsene, Kinder und Menschen mit einem niedrigeren sozioökonomischen Status sollten eine längere oder schwere Anstrengung vermeiden. Alle anderen sollten längere oder schwere Anstrengung reduzieren

aqiLevel.healthEffectsStatement: Signifikante Verschlechterung der Atemwegsbeschwerden in sensiblen Gruppen, einschließlich älterer Erwachsener, Kinder und Personen mit niedrigerem sozioökonomischen Status; signifikante Verschlechterung der Herz- oder Lungenerkrankung und vorzeitige Sterblichkeit bei Menschen mit Herz- oder Lungenerkrankung; signifikante Zunahme der Atemwegserkrankungen in der Allgemeinbevölkerung
aqiLevel.guidance: Menschen mit Herz- oder Lungenerkrankungen, ältere Erwachsene, Kinder und Menschen mit einem niedrigeren sozioökonomischen Status sollten jegliche körperliche Aktivität im Freien vermeiden. Alle anderen sollten eine längere oder schwere Anstrengung vermeiden

aqiLevel.healthEffectsStatement: Schwerwiegende Verschlechterung der Atemwegsbeschwerden in sensiblen Gruppen, einschließlich älterer Erwachsener, Kinder und Personen mit niedrigerem sozioökonomischen Status; schwere Verschlimmerung der Herz- oder Lungenkrankheit und vorzeitige Sterblichkeit bei Menschen mit Herz- oder Lungenkrankheit; ernsthaftes Risiko von Atemwegserkrankungen in der Allgemeinbevölkerung
aqiLevel.guidance: Jeder sollte jegliche körperliche Aktivität im Freien vermeiden. Menschen mit Herz- oder Lungenerkrankungen, ältere Erwachsene, Kinder und Menschen mit einem niedrigeren sozioökonomischen Status sollten im Haus bleiben und die Aktivität niedrig halten

aqiLevel.healthEffectsStatement: None
aqiLevel.guidance: None

aqiLevel.healthEffectsStatement: Respiratory symptoms possible in unusually sensitive individuals; possible aggravation of heart or lung disease in people with cardiopulmonary disease and older adults
aqiLevel.guidance: Unusually sensitive people should consider reducing prolonged or heavy exertion

aqiLevel.healthEffectsStatement: Increasing likelihood of respiratory symptoms in sensitive groups including older adults, children, and people of lower socioeconomic status; aggravation of heart or lung disease and premature mortality in people with heart or lung disease
aqiLevel.guidance: People with heart or lung disease, older adults, children, and people of lower socioeconomic status should reduce prolonged or heavy exertion

aqiLevel.healthEffectsStatement: Increased aggravation of respiratory symptoms in sensitive groups including older adults, children, and people of lower socioeconomic status; increased aggravation of heart or lung disease and premature mortality in people with heart or lung disease; increased respiratory effects in general population
aqiLevel.guidance: People with heart or lung disease, older adults, children, and people of lower socioeconomic status should avoid prolonged or heavy exertion; everyone else should reduce prolonged or heavy exertion

aqiLevel.healthEffectsStatement: Significant aggravation of respiratory symptoms in sensitive groups including older adults, children, and people of lower socioeconomic status; significant aggravation of heart or lung disease and premature mortality in people with heart or lung disease; significant increase in respiratory effects in general population
aqiLevel.guidance: People with heart or lung disease, older adults, children, and people of lower socioeconomic status should avoid all physical activity outdoors. Everyone else should avoid prolonged or heavy exertion

aqiLevel.healthEffectsStatement: Serious aggravation of respiratory symptoms in sensitive groups including older adults, children, and people of lower socioeconomic status; serious aggravation of heart or lung disease and premature mortality in people with heart or lung disease; serious risk of respiratory effects in general population
aqiLevel.guidance: Everyone should avoid all physical activity outdoors; people with heart or lung disease, older adults, children, and people of lower socioeconomic status should remain indoors and keep activity levels low

aqiLevel.healthEffectsStatement: None
aqiLevel.guidance: None

aqiLevel.healthEffectsStatement: Unusually sensitive individuals may experience respiratory symptoms
aqiLevel.guidance: Unusually sensitive people should consider reducing prolonged or heavy outdoor exertion

aqiLevel.healthEffectsStatement: Increasing likelihood of respiratory symptoms and breathing discomfort in people with lung disease (such as asthma), children, older adults, people who are active outdoors (including outdoor workers), people with certain genetic variants, and people with diets limited in certain nutrients
aqiLevel.guidance: People with lung disease (such as asthma), children, older adults, people who are active outdoors (including outdoor workers), people with certain genetic variants, and people with diets limited in certain nutrients should reduce prolonged or heavy outdoor exertion

aqiLevel.healthEffectsStatement: Greater likelihood of respiratory symptoms and breathing in people with lung disease (such as asthma), children, older adults, people who are active outdoors (including outdoor workers), people with certain genetic variants, and people with diets limited in certain nutrients; possible respiratory effects in general population
aqiLevel.guidance: People with lung disease (such as asthma), children, older adults, people who are active outdoors (including outdoor workers), people with certain genetic variants, and people with diets limited in certain nutrients should avoid prolonged or heavy outdoor exertion; everyone else should reduce prolonged or heavy outdoor exertion

aqiLevel.healthEffectsStatement: Increasingly severe symptoms and impaired breathing likely in people with lung disease (such as asthma), children, older adults, people who are active outdoors (including outdoor workers), people with certain genetic variants, and people with diets limited in certain nutrients; increasing likelihood of respiratory effects in general population
aqiLevel.guidance: People with lung disease (such as asthma), children, older adults, people who are active outdoors (including outdoor workers), people with certain genetic variants, and people with diets limited in certain nutrients should avoid all outdoor exertion; everyone else should reduce outdoor exertion

aqiLevel.healthEffectsStatement: Severe respiratory effects and impaired breathing likely in people with lung disease (such as asthma), children, older adults, people who are active outdoors (including outdoor workers), people with certain genetic variants, and people with diets limited in certain nutrients; increasingly severe respiratory effects likely in general population
aqiLevel.guidance: Everyone should avoid all outdoor exertion

aqiLevel.healthEffectsStatement: None
aqiLevel.guidance: None

aqiLevel.healthEffectsStatement: None
aqiLevel.guidance: None

aqiLevel.healthEffectsStatement: Increasing likelihood of reduced exercise tolerance due to increased cardiovascular symptoms, such as chest pain, in people with heart disease
aqiLevel.guidance: People with heart disease, such as angina, should limit heavy exertion and avoid sources of CO, such as heavy traffic

aqiLevel.healthEffectsStatement: Reduced exercise tolerance due to increased cardiovascular symptoms, such as chest pain, in people with heart disease
aqiLevel.guidance: People with heart disease, such as angina, should limit moderate exertion and avoid sources of CO, such as heavy traffic

aqiLevel.healthEffectsStatement: Significant aggravation of cardiovascular symptoms, such as chest pain, in people with heart disease
aqiLevel.guidance: People with heart disease, such as angina, should avoid exertion and sources of CO, such as heavy traffic

aqiLevel.healthEffectsStatement: Serious aggravation of cardiovascular symptoms, such as chest pain, in people with heart disease; impairment of strenuous activities in general population
aqiLevel.guidance: People with heart disease, such as angina, should avoid exertion and sources of CO, such as heavy traffic; everyone else should limit heavy exertion

aqiLevel.healthEffectsStatement: None
aqiLevel.guidance: None

aqiLevel.healthEffectsStatement: None
aqiLevel.guidance: None

aqiLevel.healthEffectsStatement: Increasing likelihood of respiratory symptoms, such as chest tightness and breathing discomfort, in people with asthma
aqiLevel.guidance: People with asthma should consider limiting outdoor exertion

aqiLevel.healthEffectsStatement: Increased respiratory symptoms, such as chest tightness and wheezing in people with asthma; possible aggravation of other lung diseases
aqiLevel.guidance: Children, people with asthma, or other lung diseases, should limit outdoor exertion

aqiLevel.healthEffectsStatement: Significant increase in respiratory symptoms, such as wheezing and shortness of breath, in people with asthma; aggravation of other lung diseases
aqiLevel.guidance: Children, people with asthma, or other lung diseases should avoid outdoor exertion; everyone else should reduce outdoor exertion

aqiLevel.healthEffectsStatement: Severe respiratory symptoms, such as wheezing and shortness of breath, in people with asthma; increased aggravation of other lung diseases; possible respiratory effects in general population
aqiLevel.guidance: Children, people with asthma, or other lung diseases, should remain indoors; everyone else should avoid outdoor exertion

aqiLevel.healthEffectsStatement: None
aqiLevel.guidance: None

aqiLevel.healthEffectsStatement: None
aqiLevel.guidance: Unusually sensitive individuals should consider limiting prolonged exertion especially near busy roads

aqiLevel.healthEffectsStatement: Increasing likelihood of respiratory symptoms, such as chest tightness and breathing discomfort, in people with asthma
aqiLevel.guidance: People with asthma, children and older adults should limit prolonged exertion especially near busy roads

aqiLevel.healthEffectsStatement: Increased respiratory symptoms, such as chest tightness and wheezing in people with asthma; possible aggravation of other lung diseases
aqiLevel.guidance: People with asthma, children and older adults should avoid prolonged exertion near roadways; everyone else should limit prolonged exertion especially near busy roads

aqiLevel.healthEffectsStatement: Significant increase in respiratory symptoms, such as wheezing and shortness of breath, in people with asthma; aggravation of other lung diseases
aqiLevel.guidance: People with asthma, children and older adults should avoid all outdoor exertion; everyone else should avoid prolonged exertion especially near busy roads

aqiLevel.healthEffectsStatement: Severe respiratory symptoms, such as wheezing and shortness of breath, in people with asthma; increased aggravation of other lung diseases; possible respiratory effects in general population
aqiLevel.guidance: People with asthma, children and older adults should remain indoors; everyone else should avoid all outdoor exertion
